definition: owner/master/host/individual or party concerned/God/Lord/main/to indicate or signify/trump card (in card games)
race/nationality/ethnicity/clan/by extension, social group (e.g. office workers 上班族)

sentences.english: Each period ends with a member of the family of elements called the noble gases.
sentences.chinese: 每一周期以惰性气体的主族元素结束。

definition: periodic table (chemistry)/abbr. of 元素週期表|元素周期表[yuan2 su4 zhou1 qi1 biao3], periodic table of the elements
lit. zero group/another word for the inert or noble gases 惰性氣體|惰性气体
alkaline earth (i.e. beryllium Be 鈹|铍, magnesium Mg 鎂|镁, calcium Ca 鈣|钙, strontium Sr 鍶|锶, barium Ba 鋇|钡 and radium Ra 鐳|镭)
simple substance (consisting purely of one element, such as diamond)

lanthanoid (rare earth series), namely: lanthanum La57 鑭|镧[lan2], cerium Ce58 鈰|铈[shi4], praseodymium Pr59 鐠|镨[pu3], neodymium Nd60 釹|钕[nu:3], promethium Pm61 鉕|钷[po3], samarium Sm62 釤|钐[shan1], europium Eu63 銪|铕[you3], gadolinium Gd64 釓|钆[ga2], terbium Tb65 鋱|铽[te4], dysprosium Dy66 鏑|镝[di1], holmium Ho67 鈥|钬[huo3], erbium Er68 鉺|铒[er3], thulium Tm69 銩|铥[diu1], ytterbium Yb70 鐿|镱[yi4], lutetium Lu71 鑥|镥[lu3]
